entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Containing{Type/Assembly/Symbol/etc} are marked nullable oblivious #58107
  • Avoid calculating inferred delegate type unnecessarily in conversions and type inference #58106
  • Value Tracking Shows ALL THE THINGS #58104
  • IDE0005 not reported as build warning #58103
  • Feature xxx is currently unavailable due to an internal error. StreamJsonRpc.RemoteInvocationException: Cannot find the old value #58102
  • [Request] "Pick members" dialog should focus search input #58099
  • API proposal: Introduce a strongly-typed diagnostic properties #58097
  • Incorrect IDE0004: Remove unnecessary cast #58095
  • Provide interactive help to reflow expressions #58093
    Backlog
  • Code cleanup supports naming style rules #58090
  • Code cleanup supports third party analyzers #58089
  • Code cleanup settings UI matches editorconfig settings editor #58088
  • Code cleanup supports editorconfig #58087

Closed

  • Select builder item if nothing in the CompletionList matches what user typed #57846
    17.1

PullRequests

Created

  • Revert SourceLink PRs #58109
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Lazy load ISourceLinkService to reduce DLL loads #58108
    Area-IDE
  • Run builds with $TempDir redirected to a new drive #58105
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update API suggestion template #58098
    Area-Infrastructure, Community
  • Report AdditionalLocations for CS8618 (uninitialized non-nullable member) #58096
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Simplify how our FatalError type works and introduce a severity concept #58094
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage

Merged

  • Skip flaky CommandLine.ArgumentParsing test #58100
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge release/dev16.9-vs-deps to release/dev16.11-vs-deps #58092
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts

Updated

  • Add scripts to verify if a branch is ready to review #58110
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add support for nullable analysis in interpolated string handler constructors #57780
    Area-Compilers
  • Implement Naming Styles for editorconfig UI #58075
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage
  • Incremental Generator Work Tracking API Implementation #55469
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, 17.1
  • Fix removal and addition of analyzer in same batch #58024
    Area-IDE
  • List patterns: Skip compiler-generated dag nodes for better codegen #57909
    Area-Compilers, Community, New Feature - List Patterns
  • Adjust doc comment for `SyntaxFactory.ParseTokens` API #58064
    Area-Compilers
  • Standardize list pattern lowering on `Index` constructor. #58055
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns
  • Fix curly brace and interpolated string #57751
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Use !! in AddParameterCheck refactoring #57934
    Area-IDE
  • API for getting a deterministic key for a Compilation #57134
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix VisualStudioActiveDocumentTracker to handle frames without text b… #58049
    Area-IDE, 17.1.P2
  • Factor nullability logic for placeholders #58036
    Area-Compilers
  • Add support for interpolations in raw string literals. #57979
    Area-Compilers
  • Port CSharpCodeActions and CSharpFindReferences to the new test harness #58037
    Area-IDE
  • Suggest parameter names from matching overloads #52801
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #58067
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fix placement of trivia inside an interpolation #57989
    Area-Compilers
  • Update new UI after design meeting #58047
    Area-IDE, UX Review Not Required
